price: (Ɔkͻmhyεni), kasε: “Medeε yɛayi akyerε me sε: “Mo Nyankopͻn no yε Nyankopͻn baako, na enti mobεbrε mo ho ase ayε Muslimifoͻ anaa?”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul innamā yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fahal antum mus'limūna
